mapper.select: SELECT ci.cart_item_id as cartItemId, p.productId as productId, p.productName as productName, p.imageUrl as imageUrl, p.price as price, ci.quantity as quantity FROM cart_item ci JOIN Products p ON ci.product_id = p.productId WHERE ci.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_item (user_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{item.userId}, #{item.productId}, #{item.quantity}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE quantity = quantity + #{item.quantity}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart_item WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_item WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
